name: AI-Augmented Development Platform
description: Enterprise platform integrating generative AI into software development lifecycle, enabling automated code review, documentation, and testing.

name: Healthcare Analytics Platform
description: Real-time analytics platform processing millions of patient records, providing actionable insights for healthcare providers.

name: Patient Engagement Suite
description: Multi-channel patient engagement platform with appointment scheduling, telehealth, and secure messaging capabilities.

name: Fintech Payment Gateway
description: High-throughput payment processing system handling 100K+ daily transactions with real-time fraud detection.

name: Enterprise Cloud Migration
description: Led migration of legacy on-premise systems to Azure cloud, achieving 40% cost reduction and improved scalability.

name: EHR Integration Hub
description: FHIR-compliant integration platform connecting 30+ EHR systems for seamless health data exchange.

name: Telehealth Video Platform
description: HIPAA-compliant video consultation platform built during COVID-19, scaling to support 10K concurrent sessions.

name: Revenue Cycle Management
description: Automated billing and claims processing system reducing claim denials by 35% through intelligent validation.

name: Clinical Decision Support
description: AI-powered clinical decision support system providing real-time alerts and recommendations for providers.

name: Mobile Health App
description: Cross-platform mobile application for patient health tracking, medication reminders, and provider communication.

name: Practice Management Dashboard
description: Real-time operational dashboard for healthcare practices showing KPIs, schedules, and financial metrics.

name: Patient Portal 2.0
description: Redesigned patient portal with improved UX, self-scheduling, and integrated payment processing.

name: Document Management System
description: Secure document storage and retrieval system with OCR capabilities for healthcare records.

name: Custom Reporting Engine
description: Flexible reporting system allowing healthcare practices to create custom reports without IT involvement.

name: Smart Appointment Scheduler
description: Intelligent scheduling system optimizing provider calendars and reducing patient wait times.

name: EHR Training Platform
description: Interactive training platform for healthcare staff to learn EHR systems through guided simulations.

name: Clinical Workflow Automation
description: Workflow automation tools reducing manual data entry and improving clinical documentation efficiency.
